alert.note: Alert for Coastal Kenedy (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 23 at 6:01AM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Inland Kenedy and Coastal Kenedy Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until noon CST today. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM CST early this morning. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from late tonight through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
